# queue-op

<div><h4>Install</h4>
<pre>npm install queue-op</pre>
</div>

<div><h4>Description</h4>
<p>Implementation of Queue(First In First Out) ADT</p>
</div>

<div>
<h4>Operations</h4>
<ul>
    <li><b>Add</b></li>
    <li><b>AddList</b></li>
    <li><b>Peek</b></li>
    <li><b>Pop</b></li>
</ul>
</div>

<div><h4>Usage</h4>
<pre>
    const queue_op = require('queue-op');    
    var queue = queue_op.initQueue();
    queue.addItem(20);
    queue.addItem(210);
    queue.addItem(10);    
    var item = queue.peek();
    console.log(item);
    var items = [10, 20, 30, 49];    
    queue.addList(items); 
    var item = queue.pop();
    console.log(item);
</pre>
</div>
